Milwaukee.WVCY-TV: WVCY-TV, virtual channel 30 (UHF digital channel 33), is a religious independent television station licensed to Milwaukee, Wisconsin, United States. Owned by VCY America, Inc., WVCY maintains studio facilities located on West Kilbourn Avenue in Milwaukee, and it shares transmitter facilities with Fox affiliate WITI (channel 6) on East Capitol Drive (just north of Highway 190) in Shorewood. WVCY is also carried on cable television throughout southeastern Wisconsin and invokes must-carry statuses for mandatory carriage.
